member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger
member.summary: This is a static class that can be used to log the perf markers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the current buffer of perf records.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger.SetTraceSourceSwitch(System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels)
member.summary: Set switch level for underlying TraceSource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger.FlushData(System.String)
member.summary: Performs data flush to the underlying stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger.LogData(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: To create a Perf record by underlying trace source.
member.param: Marker to uniquely identify this perf record
Additional data to log along with perf record.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger.Close
member.summary: Closes the trace source and performs the cleanup.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfMarkerLogger.EnableLogging(System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Enables or disables logs based on the flag

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.UnifiedServiceDesk.Performance.PerfConstants
member.summary: This class contains the names of various performance markers used in USD code. Any new marker(s) introduced in future needs to be added over here.
